snippet.title: Megaman Battle Network 5 Double Team DS trailer
snippet.description:
This trailer was shown at E3 around May of 2005. This version improves over the GBA version in almost every way.

-The soundtrack is remade in DS quality
-The graphics are cleaner, brighter, sharper, and more colorful
-It has a new map system which is displayed on the bottom screen while you move around on the top
-You even hear some spoken dialog from Megaman and the other characters during battles
